Hi everyone! I have a questions regarding with payload code. I already reached facebook even HubSpot support about this thing. Facebook give's a guide on how to paste the payload code from facebook by using HubSpot extensions  SDK. Here's the list

1.Create a custom action: First, you need to create a custom action for your payload code. This can be done by developing a custom action using the HubSpot Extensions SDK.

2. Install the custom action: Once you have developed the custom action, you can install it in your HubSpot account. This will make the custom action available for use in workflows.

3. Add the custom action to a workflow: After installing the custom action, you can add it to a workflow in HubSpot. When configuring the custom action in the workflow, you can specify the payload code that you want to execute.

4. Test and deploy the workflow: Once you have added the custom action to the workflow and configured the payload code, you can test the workflow to ensure that it functions as expected. After testing, you can deploy the workflow to start automating your desired tasks.
